main event: On May 7, 1948, approximately 50 to 60 shiny, possibly metallic objects were observed in the sky over Memphis, Tennessee, moving at extremely high speed and altitude.
interesting points: Witnesses reported the objects traveling in a straight line with some zigzagging,No sound was emitted by the objects,Some objects appeared to have a silvery tail that may have been exhaust,The objects were described as being shiny like bright aluminum,The incident attracted attention from various military and scientific officials.
witness description: Female civilians including a housekeeper and a salesman
